data.actual_result: It says "Change avatar", when you are not changing your profile picture.
data.expected_result: It should say "Change icon", like the old model, and due to the fact that it's a server icon.
data.short_description: On the new invite model, when you hover over the blank icon in "create a server", it says "change avatar".
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the new invite model. - Click on the plus (+) at the bottom of your server. - Click on the "Create a server". - Hover over the blank icon, and read what it says.
